/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -shared -Wl,-soname,libPsidon.so -o libPsidon.so CMakeFiles/Psidon.dir/src/Log/Log.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Psidon.dir/src/Events/Events.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Psidon.dir/src/Window/Window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Psidon.dir/src/Renderer/Renderer.cpp.o   -L/home/brumus/Documents/Code/C++/BGFX/Psidon/Psidon/lib/bgfx/.build/linux64_gcc/bin  -Wl,-rpath,/home/brumus/Documents/Code/C++/BGFX/Psidon/Psidon/lib/bgfx/.build/linux64_gcc/bin -lglfw -lbgfx-shared-libDebug -lGL -lX11 -lpthread -lrt
